entry.title: Homework Problems (Day-2)
entry.summary: - Video for Quartus design flow has been uploaded on the website. This video contains some extra information that will help you understand the tools better. Please go through it before starting with the homework problems.
entry.content:
• Video for Quartus design flow has been uploaded on the website. This video contains some extra information that will help you understand the tools better. Please go through it before starting with the homework problems.

  • Homework Problem are available under Lab-Handout column of Day-1 schedule. Please try out these problems before tomorrow's live session.

  • Tracefiles for homework problems are present on handout page.

In case of any issues, please post your queries on the Digital_Circuits_Lab Channel on Teams.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: This workshop will begin from 1st July. Make sure you have access to MS Teams for this workshop. If you don't have access, please post a message via google group.
entry.content: This workshop will begin from 1st July. Make sure you have access to MS Teams for this workshop. If you don't have access, please post a message via google group.
